quote_first: Jon stepped out of the Peugeot and headed inside the Shrine of the Book, his heart throbbing a pulse he could feel down to his fingertips. A walk down the ramp brought him to the office of the director, Dov Sonnenfeld. He looked at his watch:
title: A Skeleton in God's Closet
author: Paul L. Maier

quote_first: I picked up my briefcase, glancing at my watch again as I did so.
author: Stephen King
